channel.title: Weird looking glitch when i equip stuff
channel.description:
:mad:
ok, you know when you dont have anything equiped, you have clothes on (pic 1) [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii97/Mr_Random100/Nothingon1.jpg[/img]
and then, when you add something like a v brassy, your clothes come off for that section(pic 2) [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii97/Mr_Random100/Veracbrassardon1.jpg[/img]
well, im having a problem. seems like my bandos chestplate, and a couple other items wont work right (pic 3) [IMG]http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii97/Mr_Random100/bandoscheston1.jpg[/img]
see how it shows clothes and the chest? i also can get it to designate it as a body, it keeps thinking its a wep! ive added them to item4 also... help plz

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

No, that’s what he friggin’ did. No-one knows what shit does.
It’s a clientside problem, remake the item.

Read full topic
item.source: Weird looking glitch when i equip stuff

item.title: Weird looking glitch when i equip stuff
item.dc:creator: @jajab15 jajab15
item.description:
@jajab15 wrote:

First of all go to your item.cfg, add the item just like the other ones above it.
Then after that, go to your item.java and find the platebody parts.
After that, put the id of the bandos Chestplate. Then it is fixed!

Read full topic
